      protected static BoardTile findNextField​(Direction orientation, int x, int y)
      findNextField()

      orientation - direction in which next field should be found
      x - x-coordinate of current field
      y - y-coordinate of current field
      Returns:
      next boardTile

    • conveyorBeltsActivate

      public static void conveyorBeltsActivate​(int colour)
      conveyorBeltsActivate()
      Parameters:
      colour - 1 for green conveyors, 2 for blue conveyors moves robots on conveyors according to the rules of roboRally

    • gearsActivate

      public static void gearsActivate()
      gearsActivate() rotates robots standing on a gear either clockwise or counterclockwise

    • energySpacesActivate

      public static void energySpacesActivate​(int register)
      energySpacesActivate()
      Parameters:
      register - that is activated robots who end a register on an energySpace get an energyCube

    • checkPointsActivate

      public static void checkPointsActivate()
      checkPointsActivate() robots who end a register on a checkPoint have reached this checkPoint and their checkpointsReached attribute is increased

    • boardLasersActivate

      public static void boardLasersActivate() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      boardLasersActivate() robots who end a register on a field that is touched by a laserbeam get a spamCard
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • robotLasersActivate

      public static void robotLasersActivate() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      robotLasersActivate() when at the end of a register a robot faces a second robot, the second robot is hit by the first robot's laser and has to draw a spamCard
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • drawDamageAndSendDamageMessage

      public static void drawDamageAndSendDamageMessage​(Player player, Deck damageCardPile, int cardsToDraw)
      drawDamageAndSendDamageMessage()
      Parameters:
      player - who has to draw a damageCard
      damageCardPile -
      cardsToDraw - this function lets a certain player draw a certain amount of damageCards and sends a pickDamage message if the corresponding damageCardPile is empty

    • cheats

      public static void cheats​(Player player, java.lang.String input)
      cheats()
      Parameters:
      player -
      input - this function implements the cheats which are used when presenting and testing the game
